website_summaries.verdict: Adds a luminescent glow to dry or uneven skin, while blurring flaws and providing sun protection.
pros: Perfect for active types, this 70% organic vegan cream (which includes rose stem cells) is water resistant for up to 80 minutes
Hydrating and cooling, it actually improves fine lines and wrinkles
cons: Some found it became too shiny after a while

customer_reviews.title: love this product
customer_reviews.text: I use it as foundation, or base for foundation EVERY DAY. If you are fighting with melasma, then you need to use SPF every single day. Period. This is nice, and not greasy. Dr Beverly Johnson
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: ... sample of this in my birch box and I loved it. It’s light and creamy and the perfect ...
customer_reviews.text: I received a sample of this in my birch box and I loved it. It’s light and creamy and the perfect mix of light moisturizer with a touch of glow. It’s an investment at this price but if you are looking for a light touch and go product this is great..esp in the summer. If you are used to heavy makeup this will not work for you.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: I used to LOVE this stuff but when I bought this one I ...
customer_reviews.text: I used to LOVE this stuff but when I bought this one I knew the recipe they were using changed. I noticed bc it was rubbing off on absolutely everything. At first I couldn't figure out what was all over my shirts then I realized it was this. That did not happen with the bottle I had bought previously. I'm really bummed bc I thought I found the one as far as tinted SPF's go but now have had to change.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Willett

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic foundation, great sunblock, wondervul skin feel!
customer_reviews.text: This is surprisingly great foundation! When it arrived, I thought it was going to be wsy to dark for me. On a whim, I tried it anyway and to my surprise, it literally disappeared into my face. Blended nicely, and left a natural matte fjnish that looked great. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Alison Sheehan

customer_reviews.title: with a nice light tinted glow perfect for casual days or gym
customer_reviews.text: My new go-to fave. I apply it before going to the gym. It gives me the SPF needed, with a nice light tinted glow perfect for casual days or gym, when you don't want to look like you tried too hard. Smells amazing also.
customer_reviews.author: SoCalGirl

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love the product... Absolutely despise the dispenser it comes in
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the product... Absolutely despise the dispenser it comes in. it’s hard to manage how much product comes out of the pump. The product itself is wonderful and good for the skin and helps me have a glowing look but dang it’s so frustrating getting it out of this container!
customer_reviews.author: Mags

customer_reviews.title: Not my fave
customer_reviews.text: I love the Coola brand but the BB cream did not work well for me. It has a greasy look after it’s applied and gives no coverage at all. I also experienced breakouts each time I’ve used this which never happens to my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Feather and Skull

customer_reviews.title: You’ll never regret buying these products!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best ever! Please never stop making it! And please do. It change the formula! Blends perfectly, I have olive skin tone and it just effortlessly makes all my imperfections fade away leaving behind youthful glowing skin! I feel beautiful with out make up and I spent a week In Mexico on the beach in August and my face didn’t burn! The products work! Stock up!
customer_reviews.author: crystal antell

customer_reviews.title: Love it- Use it Daily
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for a while. It's effective, leaves a nice tint, very natural looking. Moisturizing but not greasy. Never makes me break out. Really nice product. I hope they don't change it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for aging skin
customer_reviews.text: It's very moist yet not greasy. Give a full skin some glow! Only 4 stars for two reasons: the coverage is minimal and the look can be too shiny/oily on areas where you don't want it (nose)
customer_reviews.author: dedad

customer_reviews.title: Love the glow and even skin tone!
customer_reviews.text: I love Coola products! 80% of my skin regime is Organic and non-toxic. I actually received this color (med-dark) instead of light-med on accident (my own mistake) but the color goes perfect with my summer-warmed skin tone. I put this on after my moisturizer and honestly I probably don't even need moisturizer in addition to this cream. It instantly moisturizes, evens skin tone, provides a healthy glow, doesn't smear or have a greasy makeup feel, and it has a subtle floral scent. It doesn't irritate at all. I get stopped with compliments on my "flawless" skin tone - thank you Coola!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bozie

customer_reviews.title: Natural ingredients
customer_reviews.text: Love the product and satisfaction with ingredients. Would prefer a bit darker and maybe they will come out with more shades . I live in South Florida & need daily sun screen for my face. Use it everyday and it holds up well even when I’m sweating
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for complexion balancing
customer_reviews.text: I wear this all the time and really do love it. My face is a bit dry so this moisturizes a bit. I have sensitive skin (and rosacea) and it doesn’t break me out and tones down the red. I’m a fan.
customer_reviews.author: nycgal

customer_reviews.title: rolls off on your face like peeling skin
customer_reviews.text: It smells nice when you apply it, but 30-40 min later the smell turns sour and unpleasant. The face looks luminous and tinted, but the product peels off like dead skin when you rub it. Still have half of the bottle, don't know what to do with it.
customer_reviews.author: Lana S

customer_reviews.title: Love this BB Cream!
customer_reviews.text: This BB Cream is amazing lightweight and just perfect, it is literally the only thing I have purchased that I received in my ipsy bag this year. It gives my skin a great glow and evens it out overall. I still use my favorite concealer for my annoying dark undereye circles and to cover any blemishes. Most foundations and creams leave my skin flaky but this one is so moisturizing I don't have to worry about that. Love it, worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: C. Lo.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I love how lightweight the formula feels and how seamlessly it blends into my skin to add minimal coverage. I have oily skin so to eliminate the shine I just tap Dermablend translucent setting powder over it and it lasts all day. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: RN2007

customer_reviews.title: Coola is a wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It has an SPF of 30. The coverage is beautiful. I wish it came in a more travel-friendly package instead of in a heavy glass container, but I'll make do because I love this product so much. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Ariana Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Glowing skin
customer_reviews.text: The BEST BB cream out there. Perfect for pool and work out days. I wear under my foundation on full makeup days. I love the dewy glow it gives my skin. Good SPF and moisturizing. It is sheer and light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Toni B.

customer_reviews.title: The Holy Grail
customer_reviews.text: This is the holy grail. It works on my sensitive skin after a mask or hair removal. No eye pain and smells like a dream. Don't let the price sway you. It is more than worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Dana W.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I received a sample in my Birchbox and loved it. I tried to find cheaper alternatives but didn’t like any. I decided to splurge and bought this - no regrets. Worth every penny! It’s actually larger than I thought and should last a good amount of time. It goes on smooth, so lightweight and my complexion looks so much better. Love this product.
customer_reviews.author: ecarg

customer_reviews.title: Personal Favorite
customer_reviews.text: COOLA BB+ Cream is fantastic on my face! Not only does it goes on smooth and light.... but it really has changed my skin for the better! Worth the price tag!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jes

customer_reviews.title: Great product, only wish there were more colors
customer_reviews.text: I love the texture, smell, bottle and lightweight coverage of this product, I love that it’s a natural sunscreen. I only wish that they had an even lighter color. Even this color is too dark for my skin (I’m light skinned but not THAT white) and I have to blend it out with regular sunscreen.
customer_reviews.author: David R Miller

customer_reviews.title: Pass, way too shiny
customer_reviews.text: The color is very light and my skin was suuuuper shiny. Even urban decay oil setting spray didn't change that. This is just not the right product for me.
customer_reviews.author: ck813

customer_reviews.title: nit heavy when applied and doesnt feel or look like you are waering makeup
customer_reviews.text: i love being able to get this product from the vender and not having to go thru my beauticians. this is such a wonderful treat to your face when you put it on. it is not cakey or heavy .thank you
customer_reviews.author: Nanaglo

customer_reviews.title: Will Likely Re-purchase - High Quality Ingredients
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy this BB cream. The texture is velvety, and my skin adapted well; however, it does not offer much in terms of evening out my skin tone. Very minimal coverage.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Great Tinted Moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: Love this tinted moisturizer! Not too thick of a lotion and makes you look lightly bronzed. My skin is super sensitive and this brand did not cause a reaction.
customer_reviews.author: James Magnusson

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I like the feel of this product. It is sheer and and goes on smooth. The only problem is it kind of has a pink tint to it. I chose light/ medium.
customer_reviews.author: C&T

customer_reviews.title: Not for people with lines or wrinkles
customer_reviews.text: If you have lines or wrinkles this product is not going to help you hiding them. Nice color though.
customer_reviews.author: Valeria

customer_reviews.title: Complete natural look in one product.
customer_reviews.text: Make skin look refreshed and glowing. A minute after application I feel my skin tightens. The tint is deep enough tha i don't use any foundation or powder anymore. Perfect natural look.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Praschnik

customer_reviews.title: Love Coola!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful combination of light coverage, moisture and sun protection.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Great spf and nice glow!
customer_reviews.text: Great spf and lightweight moisturizer! Nice tint and gives you a healthy looking glow. Doesn’t provide much coverage so if that’s what you want this isn’t it.
customer_reviews.author: Janet W

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff for summer :-) feels great. Blends easy. Smells wonderful :-) color doesn’t need to be exact match bc it blends with skin easily
customer_reviews.author: Krista k.

customer_reviews.title: Organic & good for skin
customer_reviews.text: Great coverage and moisturization with protection... matches skin well smooth under makeup... a solid addition to my makeup routine
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Smells good slide down my face even better
customer_reviews.text: The packaging is phenomenal. It smells good, but it broke me out in little red bumps but they went away I guess after my body acclimated to the product. IDK I honestly would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Brent Polin

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: I first purchased this product at a Westin Spa. Instead of using foundation, this is a light base, great moisturizer, and has SPF. After application, I do not look like I have caked on makeup. My skin looks healthy and natural. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: sarah winch

customer_reviews.title: Quick ship!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It is perfect for me: great SPF, feels wonderful on my skin, and subtly evens out my skin tone. It smells good, too!
customer_reviews.author: Kortney Kropp

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite item!
customer_reviews.text: I use this as spf, moisturizer and a foundation. One product for all three. it is lightweight and it has a light reflecting quality that makes my skin always look like it's glowing. I get compliments all the time that my skin looks great. I love this product. Can't recommend it enough. LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Thompson

customer_reviews.title: I’ll say give it a try.
customer_reviews.text: Love the way my face feel and looks since I started using it
customer_reviews.author: Lolita

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: i like it however, has a bit of a shine to it so I'm not going to be purchasing anymore.
customer_reviews.author: C. Schnaible

customer_reviews.title: I converted from the cheap stuff and I’m not going back!
customer_reviews.text: A friend gave me a sample of this BB cream and it’s more expensive than others I have used, but now I don’t even wear makeup daily, like I did before, because my complexion is so much better. I definitely think the quality of this makeup was one of the first good things I’ve done for my skin in a long time. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle B.

customer_reviews.title: Fresh faced and dewy glow!
customer_reviews.text: Fresh faced and youthful glow. I get compliments often since wearing this lightweight BB cream. Definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: TBro

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This smells wonderful and makes my face glow. I love it. It is hard to keep looking matte, so that's the reason for the 4 star
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Awesome foundation and sun protection!
customer_reviews.text: Best foundation I've ever used! I live in Florida and the SPF 30 is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: SpanishSam

customer_reviews.title: Best sunscreen for the face
customer_reviews.text: Best sunscreen for the face. I apply it before heading out on the boat, I spend the day out on the boat and on the water and never need to reapply it.
customer_reviews.author: Ody Bello-Quintero

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. It is light weight but still has great coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes your skin glow!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love! Amazing product and came super fast! Will definitely order from seller again!
customer_reviews.author: LYNN MARSANICO

customer_reviews.title: review
customer_reviews.text: It looks very natural on however not sure how well it protects from the sun; but I go out everyday and I live in San Diego so I may be a lost cause
customer_reviews.author: Jess Jameson

customer_reviews.title: Great, looks & feels wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Love the subtle fragrance & feel. I add a very small amount of water on my fingers, mix & pat on my face, if I want more coverage I use without water.
customer_reviews.author: P Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Foundation moisturizer and sunscreen all in one!
customer_reviews.text: Best product I have ever put on my face. I get compliments of my glowing skin when I wear it and I’m 55 years old!!!!
customer_reviews.author: neecers

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this product, covers great and is not heavy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Keller

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, soft finish
customer_reviews.text: Easy to apply and blends nicely. Don't worry about trying to match to exact skin color like I did because it really blends well.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Great light coverage B.B. cream
customer_reviews.text: This is light in weight with light to medium coverage. I love the shade and the texture. It actually conditions my skin as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Anne Hatch

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: I hate spending money on makeup, but this cream was 100% worth the money!!!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Glowy, light to medium coverage
customer_reviews.text: Love the glowy, light to medium coverage, with no sparkle or shimmer. Worked great on my summer tanned skin. Will buy the light shade for the winter months.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie L Donnachie

customer_reviews.title: Feels great
customer_reviews.text: Feels light on skin, doesn’t cake, and has a nice tint (not too dark)
customer_reviews.author: Janet DeCant

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE how Coola Creme smells, & how radiant my skin appears!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

product_meta.title: COOLA Rosilliance Mineral BB+ Cream Tinted Organic Sunscreen, Broad Spectrum SPF 30
product_meta.description:
Color:Light/MediumAnd the final rose goes to... our Mineral Face SPF 30 Rosilliance BB+ Cream, which nourishes, protects, and evens out the look of your skin all in a few drops. Inactive ingredients are Aluminum Hydroxide, Caprylhydroxamic Acid, Caprylyl Glycol, Carthamus Tinctorius (ORGANIC Safflower) Seed Oil, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (ORGANIC Orange) Fruit Water, Cocoglycerides, Commiphora Myrrha Leaf Cell Extract, Cucumis Sativus (ORGANIC Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Euterpe Oleracea Pulp (ORGANIC Acai) Oil, Flavor, Glycerin (ORGANIC), Helianthus Annuus (ORGANIC Sunflower) Seed Extract, Helianthus Annuus (ORGANIC Sunflower) Seed Oil*, Hydrogen Dimethicone, Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein / PVP Crosspolymer, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Iron Oxides, Mica, Octyldodecyl Oleate, Oryza Sativa (ORGANIC Rice) Bran Oil, Plankton Extract, Propanediol, Rosa Alba Leaf Cell Extract, Rosa Centifolia Leaf Cell Extract, Rosa Damascena Leaf Cell Extract, Rosa Gallica Leaf Cell Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (ORGANIC Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Sodium Citrate, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Water, Xanthan Gum.

1
At COOLA, we're passionate about creating happy, healthy lifestyle experiences. We believe that clean beauty should feel as good as it is healthy, which is why we develop organic products that you'll love wearing every day.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
